text: Frederator Studios is a American animation studio and production company known for producing The Fairly OddParents for both Nickelodeon and Nicktoons, Wow! Wow! Wubbzy! and Adventure Time for Cartoon Network. Their upcoming projects include a revival to Maggie and the Ferocious Beast, several Adventure Time spinoffs and a television series adaptation for BuzzFeed's webseries, "Chikn Nugget". Category:American animation studios
title: Frederator Studios
